title: Egypt confirms international leaders’ summit on Monday to discuss Gaza ceasefire - live
summary: Over 500,000 Palestinians are returning to the devastated Gaza City amid ongoing conflict. As the humanitarian crisis unfolds, 20 world leaders, including former President Trump, are set to engage in discussions regarding the situation. The talks aim to address the escalating tensions and seek potential solutions for the affected region.

summary: America's sweetheart was an extraordinary actor known for her unique talent and fresh performances. title: Donald Trump and Abdel Fatah al-Sisi to chair Gaza peace summit on Monday
summary: A meeting is set to be held in Sharm el-Sheikh, Egypt, featuring leaders from over 20 countries. The Egyptian presidency confirmed the event, emphasizing its significance. Specific details about the agenda or topics to be discussed have not been disclosed.

title: Portugal 1-0 Republic of Ireland, Spain 2-0 Georgia: World Cup 2026 qualifying – as it happened
summary: Ireland was edged out by Spain, who secured their perfect record with a late header from Ruben Neves. Meanwhile, Italy showed signs of improvement, continuing their revival in the ongoing tournament. The match highlights the competitive landscape of international football.
